cnbc.title: Gemini, the Winklevoss' crypto exchange, pops more than 14% in Nasdaq debut
cnbc.summary: Shares of Gemini Space Station rallied Friday after the exchange operator raised $425 million in an initial public offering.

cnbc.title: Pfizer, Moderna shares fall on report that Trump officials will link child deaths to Covid shots
cnbc.summary: The report says officials plan to include the claim in a presentation next week to a key vaccine panel that advises the CDC on shot access and coverage.

cnbc.title: $7 trillion 'wall of cash' worry is looming for investors once Fed interest rate cuts start
cnbc.summary: Trillions of dollars are parked in money market funds due to years of high rates, but with the Fed poised to cut, portfolio moves will need to be made.

cnbc.title: Charlie Kirk shooter: Officials identify Tyler Robinson as suspect after arrest
cnbc.summary: Kirk, an ally of President Donald Trump, was shot during an event at Utah Valley University, kicking off a multi-day manhunt.

cnbc.title: Eli Lilly, Novo Nordisk prepare to face off in the next obesity drug battleground

cnbc.summary: The White House search for the next Federal Reserve chair continues to twist and turn.

cnbc.title: Opendoor board chair Rabois says company is 'bloated,' needs to cut 85% of workforce
cnbc.summary: Keith Rabois was named chairman of Opendoor this week and the company, which he co-founded, hired former Shopify executive Kaz Nejatian as its new CEO.

cnbc.title: Tim Cook explains why Apple is investing heavily in Corning's glass factory
cnbc.summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook told CNBC's Jim Cramer why his company is investing $2.5 billion to manufacture glass in Corning's Kentucky factory.

cnbc.title: Apple, Google and Meta are trying to perfect a science fiction gadget: The universal translator
cnbc.summary: Apple, Google and Meta are capitalizing on advancements in AI to bring new translation features to their latest hardware devices.
